item.title: Weird Error
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

procedure FightChicken; var inFight, recXP : boolean; begin wait(3000 + Random(941)); if GetColor(255, 148) = intHealth then begin inFight := true; recXP := true; end else begin inFight := false; end; wait(5000 + Random(941)); while(inFight) do begin wait(5000 + random(941)); if GetColor(255, 148) = intHealth then inFight := true else inFight := false; end; if recXP then <---LINE 114 HERE begin intChicksKilled := intChicksKilled + 1; intXP := intXP + 9; end; end;

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Error
item.dc:creator: @Maxcor3 Maxcor3
item.description:
@Maxcor3 wrote:

I am working on my first script and I keep getting this error:

Failed when compiling Line 114: [Error] (14795:1): 'BEGIN' expected in script C:\Users\Max\Documents\SCAR\Chicken Pwner\Chicken Pwner.scar

I have checked over and over again and cannot find anything wrong. Here is the method that is causing the problem:

procedure FightChicken; var inFight, recXP : boolean; begin wait(3000 + Random(941)); if GetColor(255, 148) = intHealth then begin inFight := true; recXP := true; end else begin inFight := false; end; wait(5000 + Random(941)); while(inFight) do begin wait(5000 + random(941)); if GetColor(255, 148) = intHealth then begin inFight := true; end else inFight := false; end; end; if recXP then <---LINE 114 HERE begin intChicksKilled := intChicksKilled + 1; intXP := intXP + 9; end; end;

Any ideas?

Read full topic
